ul.li: Java Runtime Environment (JRE) 1.6 or higher (for the quiz system);

conbody.p: .NET Framework 4.0 Client Profile and JRE are included in Dialog Nibelung installation package.

Windows Media Player 10 comes as a standard part of Windows Vista and subsequent Windows versions. Some anti-virus software may interfere with certain functions of Dialog Nibelung (e.g. file transfer). If this is the case, this anti-virus software will have to be properly set up or even disabled.
